definition: to spread out (material)/to pave (the way, a road etc)
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Now paved and smooth as glass on over to Stumpy Meadows Reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 现在，顺利铺平玻璃上交给矮墩墩迈德斯水库。

sentences.english: Their economic policy pave the way for industrial expansion.
sentences.chinese: 他们的经济政策为工业发展铺平了道路。

sentences.english: Give me reason , to fill this hole, connect the space between.
sentences.chinese: 给我理由，填满沟壑，将这断路铺平。

sentences.english: Spread batter into prepared tin and bake for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把面糊倒入烘盘里，铺平，盛入烤箱烘约30分钟。

sentences.english: That would pave the way for newlywed Odom to start in his place.
sentences.chinese: 那就为新婚燕尔的奥多姆顶替他首发铺平了道路。

sentences.english: Mother always smoothes out the table-cloth after each meal.
sentences.chinese: 每顿饭饭后母亲总是把桌布布铺平。

sentences.english: Their testimony paved the way to Nuremberg.
sentences.chinese: 他们的证词铺平了纽伦堡审判之路。

sentences.english: Continuous bombing spearheaded the way to occupying the city.
sentences.chinese: 持续不停的轰炸为攻克该城铺平了道路。

sentences.english: That would pave the way for Obama to announce the US targets soon after.
sentences.chinese: 这将为奥巴马不久后宣布美国的减排目标铺平了道路。

sentences.english: I believe this treaty will pave the way to peace in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这个条约将为欧洲的和平铺平道路。

sentences.english: It is set in clear crystal pavé and dangles from an elegant rhodium-plated necklace.
sentences.chinese: 它以清晰和垂下水晶铺平从优雅的镀铑项链。

sentences.english: Give me reason, to fill this hole, connect the space between.
sentences.chinese: 给本人理由，填满豁口，将这断路铺平。

sentences.english: The change of name will now pave the way for the demerger.
sentences.chinese: 现在名称的变更为拆分铺平了道路。

sentences.english: The area around the pool becomes a sunken courtyard paved in travertine with steps and walls of stone.
sentences.chinese: 周围地区池成为沉没铺平庭院中的步骤和石灰墙石。

sentences.english: A lessening of inflation would help pave the way for a relaxation of China’s policy stance.
sentences.chinese: 通胀的减轻有助于为缓和中国的政策立场铺平道路。

sentences.english: This agreement paves the way for (or: to) a lasting peace in the region.
sentences.chinese: 这项协议为本地区的持久和平铺平了道路。

definition: to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to lay (a foundation)/to conquer (a city etc)/to shoot down (a bird etc)
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
successfully accomplished (project or goal)/to be highly successful
